{"id": "4974", "title": "Bug 4974: Set classpath / output location should be one operation", "description": "", "OB": "The bug report does not provide any details about what the actual problem or issue is.", "EB": "", "SR": "1. Create a project with 'src' as the source folder and 'bin' as the output location. 
2. In the project properties, change the settings to use the project as both the source folder and the output location."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '4974', 'title': 'Bug 4974Set classpath / output location should be one operation', 'description': '', 'OB': '', 'EB': '', 'SR': "204:1. create a project with 'src' as source folder and 'bin' as output location.2. in the project properties change the setting to use the project as sourcefolder and the project as output location. "}
